Uses of Package
com.rockhoppertech.music

  • Packages that use com.rockhoppertech.music 
    Package Description
    com.rockhoppertech.music
    These are the "core" or essential music classes.
    com.rockhoppertech.music.chord
    Chord classes.
    com.rockhoppertech.music.midi.js
    These are the classes that use JavaSound to manipulate MIDI files, create MIDI data, and play them.
    com.rockhoppertech.music.midi.js.modifiers.google  
    com.rockhoppertech.music.midi.parse
    MIDI String Parsing.
    com.rockhoppertech.music.modifiers
    MIDITrack manipulation classes.
    com.rockhoppertech.music.scale
    Scale classes.
    com.rockhoppertech.music.series.time
    Time Series classes.
  • Classes in com.rockhoppertech.music used by com.rockhoppertech.music 
    Class and Description
    Duration.Dur 
    Note
    The Note class is a utility.
    Pattern
    Essentially a holder for the values to create a MIDITrack based on a given set of degrees and a pattern contained in an int array.
    PatternBuilder
    Josh Bloch's pattern and not the GoF pattern.
    Pitch
    A representation of musical frequency (Pitch).
    Pitch.P 
    Pitch.PitchClassComparator 
    PitchFormat
    Formats the text representation of a Pitch.
    Timed
    A class with a start time and a duration.
